name: Enoki
description:
Mushrooms - combine some of the characteristics of plants and animals. Fungi are present in all ecological niches - in water and on land, in soil and on all kinds of other substrates. Our task is to solve puzzles, collect coins and make three rows.

Game features
  • Enoki Mushroom Control
  • Ability to move objects
  • Keys, Switches and Levers
  • Many interesting quests
  • Match 3 puzzles
  • Collecting coins
